NK041(di)038:1: // rdo rje theg pa'i dkyil chog gang la'ang sbyar chog
NK041(di)038:2: pa yan lag brgyad pa'i 'bru 'grel nyung ngur bsdus
NK041(di)038:3: pa bzhugs so // na mo gu ra we /
NK041(di)038:4: 'dir snga 'gyur rnying ma'i bka' gter rnams nas yang
NK041(di)038:5: yang 'byung ba'i yan lag brgyad pa 'di la kun
NK041(di)038:6: mkhyen bla ma'i zhal rgyun mdor bsdus pa'i tshul gyis
NK041(di)038:7: spyi don bkra shis pa'i rtags kyi grangs dang ldan
NK041(di)038:9: nga rgyal gyi gnyen po phyag 'tshal ba /
NK041(di)038:10: ma gus pa'i gnyen po skyabs su 'gro ba /
NK041(di)038:11: ser sna'i gnyen po mchod pa 'bul ba /
NK041(di)038:12: zhe sdang gi gnyen po sdig pa bshags pa /
NK041(di)038:13: phrag dog gi gnyen po rjes su yi rang ba /
NK041(di)038:14: rang don yid byed kyi gnyen po byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa /
NK041(di)038:15: gces 'dzin gyi gnyen po lus 'bul ba /
NK041(di)038:16: the tshom gyi gnyen po dge ba byang chub tu bsngo ba'o //
NK041(di)038:18: rdo rje slob dpon rang la lam ston par byed
NK041(di)038:19: pa'i rigs kun gyi bdag po dkyil 'khor kun gyi
NK041(di)038:20: gtso bor mnga' dbang rdzogs pa'i khyab bdag chen po
NK041(di)038:21: rang nyid la rang byung gi rig pa ngo sprod
NK041(di)038:22: pa'i rtsa ba'i bla ma nyid yin la /
NK041(di)038:23: sangsa rgyas phyogs bcu'i zhing khams rab 'byams rdul gcig
NK041(di)038:24: gi steng na rdul snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam par
NK041(di)038:26: dpal ni ma 'ongs pa na 'byon par 'gyur ba'i
NK041(di)038:27: kun gzhi bde gshegs snying po'i sems can thams cad
NK041(di)038:28: yin pas na / dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs
NK041(di)038:29: pa dang 'byon par 'gyur pa thams cad la phyag
NK041(di)038:30: yin pas na / 'tshal lo // gnyis pa /
NK041(di)038:32: gang la bsten na don che ba //
NK041(di)038:33: dkon mchog de la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)038:35: phyi ltar na dkon mchog gsum /
NK041(di)038:36: nang ltar na rtsa ba gsum /
NK041(di)038:37: gsang ba ltar na sku gsuma kun 'dus kyi bdag nyid can /
NK041(di)038:38: bsten pa'i zhing du gyur pa thams cad la /
NK041(di)038:39: gang la skyabs su 'gro ba'i yul /
NK041(di)038:40: gang gis skyabs su 'gro ba'i gang zag /
NK041(di)038:41: ji ltar skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshul rnams gnyis su med pa'i yid kyis skyabs su mchi /
NK041(di)038:43: dngos su 'byor pa'i mchod pa phyi mchod nyer spyod /
NK041(di)038:45: gsang ba bdud rtsi byang sems dang bza' bca' btung ba'i tshogs kyi longs spyod /
NK041(di)038:46: yid kyis sprul pa'i mchod pa stong gsum rab 'byams
NK041(di)038:47: kyi 'jig rten bye ba phrag brgya'i zhing khams su
NK041(di)038:48: mchod pa'i dngos po ji snyed yod pa thams cad
NK041(di)038:50: 'bul ba'i zhing dag pa mchog gsum rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams la /
NK041(di)038:51: dngos po dag pa dngos zhen ser sna dang bral ba /
NK041(di)038:52: bsam pa dag pa nyes pa'i skyon rnams dang bral ba ste /
NK041(di)038:53: dag pa'i mchod pa rnams stong nyid kyi rtsis dang
NK041(di)038:54: ma bral ba'i ngang nas phul ba rgyal ba sras
NK041(di)038:55: dang bcas pa rnams kyis bzhes su gsol /
NK041(di)038:57: dngos grub kyi chu bo chen po nyid thob pa
NK041(di)038:58: la bar du gcod pa'i gegas su gyur pa nyes
NK041(di)038:59: byas te so byang sngags gsum gyi ldog phyogs kyi
NK041(di)038:60: pham ltung rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig
NK041(di)038:61: nyams chag nyes ltung chu bo gang+g+aa la rags brtsegs
NK041(di)038:62: pa lta bu'i gegs su gyur pa thams cad ma
NK041(di)038:63: lus pa / tshogs rten dpang por bzhugs pa'i spyan
NK041(di)038:64: sngar gnyen po stobs bzhi tshang ba'i sgo nas bshagsa
NK041(di)038:65: lus pa / par bgyi'o // lnga pa /
NK041(di)038:66: phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste /
NK041(di)038:67: thog mtha' bar gsum dge ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo
NK041(di)038:68: dus gsum du ma chags shing sems can rnams kyi
NK041(di)038:69: don du rtag par khyab brdal lhun grub chen por
NK041(di)038:70: spyod pa la rjes su yi rang ngo //
NK041(di)038:73: 'di la bsal bya ci yang med //
NK041(di)038:74: bsnan par bya ba'ang ci yang med //
NK041(di)038:75: yang dag nyid la yang dag blta //
NK041(di)038:76: yang dag mthong na rnam grol lo //
NK041(di)038:78: rang gi rig pa ye nas rnam par dag pa'i
NK041(di)038:79: chos can de nyid yod med rtag chad kyi mtha'
NK041(di)038:80: bzhi'i dri ma dang bral ba'i bla na med pa
NK041(di)038:81: mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog tu mnyam par
NK041(di)038:84: spangs rtogs legs par rdzogs pa'i mchog tu bde bar
NK041(di)038:85: gshegs pas na bde gshegs te 'das pa'i sangs rgyas
NK041(di)038:86: rnams dang / dbang phyug ni da lta dbang bskur /
NK041(di)038:88: man ngag ston mdzad rdo rje slob dpon bka' drin gsum ldan nyid dang /
NK041(di)038:89: semas can ma 'ongs pa na 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur pa gzhi gcig gis bsdus pa thams cad la /
NK041(di)038:90: dgos pa rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas lus 'bul ba ste /
NK041(di)038:91: bde gshegs rnams la lus phul bas tshogs gnyis rdzogs /
NK041(di)038:92: sgrib gnyis byang nas rgyal ba rnams kyi sras kyi thu bor 'gyur ba'i dgos pa /
NK041(di)038:93: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug bla ma la lus phul bas
NK041(di)038:94: mnyes pa gsum gyi sgo nas thugs rgyud dgongs pa'i
NK041(di)038:95: byin rlabs thob pa'i dgos pa /
NK041(di)038:96: ma 'ongs pa na 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i sems
NK041(di)038:97: can thams cad la lus phul bas gnas skabs su
NK041(di)038:98: 'dod pa'i don thams cad 'grub cing mthar thug tshom
NK041(di)038:99: bu gcig tu 'tshang rgya ba'i dgos pa de dag
NK041(di)038:100: sgrub pa'i phyir du lus 'bul lo //
NK041(di)038:102: tshe rabsa bgrangs pa'i las te dus gsum du bsags shing bsags pa bsags 'gyur te /
NK041(di)038:103: mdor na gcig tu rnam par dag pa dge ba'i
NK041(di)038:104: phyogs kyi las rnams kun gcig tu bsdus te mthar
NK041(di)038:105: thug rdzogs pa'i byang chub chen por yongs su bsngo
